snippet.title: Bass Defense - Official Alpha Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
About Bass Defense

Wishlist and get it on Steam - coming 19 Aug 2024
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3027000/Bass_Defense__Rhythm_Meets_Strategy/

Bass Defense combines musical rhythm-based gameplay with strategic elements. You must hit the correct buttons in time with the music to clear your NMYs who try to destroy your base, unless you save it with the help of your upgradable - defensive or offensive - power-ups or your sense of rhythm.

About Bass Defense: First Memorythms

Play free on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3086940/Bass_Defense_First_Memorythms/

In Bass Defense's rhythm-based and action-packed 'Soundwave' game mode, you must hit the correct buttons in time with the music to clear your NMYs and save your base with the help of your upgradable power-ups or your sense of rhythm. Try your luck and 5 memorythms in this free episode.

Find us on Steam, Discord and socials
https://steamcommunity.com/app/3027000/discussions/
https://steamcommunity.com/app/3086940/discussions/
https://discord.gg/4a4GZrMjWn
https://www.youtube.com/@WOMBEX-Games
https://x.com/wombex
https://bass-defense.com
